body_html:
The official docker images are here: https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

The docker image referenced: floydhub/tensorflow:1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.22, is not an official image, and when built they specified TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=7.0. An issue could be open against floydhub to have them rebuild the image with expanded TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES.
body_text:
The official docker images are here: https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/
The docker image referenced: floydhub/tensorflow:1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.22, is not an official image, and when built they specified TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=7.0. An issue could be open against floydhub to have them rebuild the image with expanded TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES.
body:
The official docker images are here: https://hub.docker.com/r/tensorflow/tensorflow/tags/

The docker image referenced: floydhub/tensorflow:1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.22, is not an official image, and when built they specified TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=7.0. An issue could be open against floydhub to have them rebuild the image with expanded TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES.
